introduction:
The Egg

Story by Andy Weir
Animated by Kurzgesagt

A Big Thanks to Andy Weir for allowing us to use

vocabulary.example: She refused to eat anything without first mincing it into tiny pieces.
He gave her a contemptuous look before turning away.

vocabulary.definition: born again in another body after death
vocabulary.example: According to the belief in reincarnation, the soul is reincarnated multiple times.
She watched the magician's tricks with fascination.
He was appalled by the lack of hygiene in the restaurant.

vocabulary.definition: unwilling or unable to believe something
vocabulary.example: The audience looked incredulous when the magician made the elephant disappear.
